text:
Internet's Favourite Kid Taimur Gets Decked Up For Festivities, Looks Cute As A Button!
Internet's Favourite Kid Taimur Gets Decked Up For Festivities, Looks Cute As A Button!
Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khan are pretty aware of the fact that Taimur's current popularity is way more than theirs combined. Ever since Taimur was born, he became a topic of discussion on the internet.
Viral Bhayani
And now, all it takes is just one cute picture and everyone goes gushing.
Today, Taimur has again managed to take over the internet. What looks like a festive celebration with his tiny-tot friends at home has him all decked up for the occasion. Sporting a purple Kurta and looking cute and clueless in almost all the pictures that have been floating online, paps' favorite boy Tim looks cute as a button.
In case you are having a dull day, these pictures of Taimur will surely lighten it up. Have a look at the pictures.
Don't Miss 707 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES
title: Internet's Favourite Kid Taimur Gets Decked Up For Festivities, Looks Cute As A Button!

Sporting a purple Kurta and looking cute and clueless in almost all the pictures that have been floating online, paps' favorite boy Tim looks as cute as a button.
